name: miaos-skill-write-code
description: Write and run scripts in an isolated environment

skill.name: Write Code
skill.description: Write a JavaScript (Node.js) script and run it in an isolated sandbox. Use when the user wants to run code, try a snippet, or execute a small script. Only JavaScript is supported. You must provide userRequest (what the user asked for) so the code can be reviewed before running. Returns stdout, stderr, and any error.

code.description: The JavaScript source code to run

userRequest.description: Short summary of what the user asked the code to do (required for safety review before running)
